lead_paragraph: An article on Wednesday about José Canseco’s new book on the use of performance-enhancing drugs in baseball referred incorrectly to a report in The New York Times in January involving his proposal to keep Magglio Ordóñez of the Chicago White Sox out of the book. The Times reported that Canseco had asked Ordóñez to invest in a $5 million movie project he was promoting — not that Canseco had asked for $5 million to help finance a film.
